wikipedia_page.main:
Anastasia Atanesyan is a British/Russian independent film producer, also known as Ana Atanesyan.
Her production Zebra Crossings (2008, Sam Holland - writer/director) received the Raindance Award (British Independent Film Awards). It was released theatrically and on DVD on 29 January 2011.
She is currently producing 7 Days of Crazy, also written by Sam Holland.
